Forget storing any photos on your computer to show anyone .. the computer is only 16 gb, meaning you have to be online to show anyone your photos?!Maybe you like torrents .. nope you cant download any torrents on google chromebook.Maybe you dreamed of writing a screenplay.. nope it cant run Final Draft.The list goes on and on it cant run almost anything ...  please understand the pigeon hole you put yourself by buying this thing. For the same money you can buy an awesome microsoft 8 machine and it can do anything or splurge on a nice mac and you wont be disappointed, just please dont make the same mistake I did.

Reviews.Title: its ok
Reviews.Author: fifel
Reviews.Content: its ok. it boots up fast. kind of limited as to programs and such. it is pretty "locked in" ie you cant set one of your own pictures as the wallpaper? seems like u must hack the thing to get it to do something youd want to do. very good laptop for kids maybe..?i think google could have done better.

Reviews.Title: Item does not Work.
Reviews.Author: Ericalo
Reviews.Content: The computer was brought to Brazil by a friend and it does not turn on. I can't ship back to US because the taxes and freight would be more expensive than the product. It sucks!

Reviews.Title: Very excited became very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: April Lily
Reviews.Content: The first thing I must say is that the Chromebook is an attractive electronic. I loved it from the moment I opened the box. I even loved the look of the chrome operating system. Unfortunately, it didn't take me long using the device to realize that aesthetics weren't enough to make a proper computer. Everything you can do on a chromebook, you can ALREADY do. I somehow glossed over the fact that the chromebook is a machine to go onto the internet, and nothing more. My ipod has a more substantial hard drive than this computer. The difficulty in printing was the final straw before I returned this product. I am a college student, and I often have almost no time to print my papers. With the chromebook, I would either have to purchase a new, cloud ready printer, OR set my printer up manually to another computer in order to print from mine. The hassle wasn't worth it and I immediately sent it back.Since sending the chromebook back, I realized very quickly that the chromebook is exactly what I didn't want. I want a computer who's apps are not simply webpages, but a program on my computer equipped to handle exactly what I am trying to do, even if I don't have an internet connection (especially since while at home, I don't have one.)All in all, I'd say don't buy it. Unless, of course, you have oodles of money and you want a really sexy device to surf the web with, and nothing more.

Reviews.Title: low GB's???
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: I'm looking at the specs and I think I need to point out that the memory is only 4GB... (LOW) in today's standards.  Also the Hard Drive is only 16GB(very LOW), the computer i'm working from has 6GB memory(upgraded from 4GB) and 500GB HD, purchased 2 years ago...  I love Google and Samsung, I was excited about a laptop for just $249-$449, but the Chromebook 550 just doesnt have the hardware for me to replace my (6GB Ram and 500GB HD) Lenovo Lap Top with.  New products are usually not so good, I hope they get all the bugs out and put out a comparable Lap Top soon... Look at the specs guys and compare what you are purchasing before you make a $249-$449 mistake.

Reviews.Title: Don`t worth it
Reviews.Author: Carlos Eduardo
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer thinking that I could do the most things I used to do on anyother computer with chrome and internet, But it`s not true, chromeOS can`t do many things that any other OS can do, like runing videos and moveis, listen music or even text editing.Like a early adopter user, would be nice if it was cheaper than it is, US$ 500 on a computer that can not be used like "real computer''  is not a good deal.

Reviews.Title: I totally hate this piece of Crap and they will not allow me to return it.
Reviews.Author: roxie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to replace another computer, I totally hate this product. Do not Waste your money! I tried to return it and I was told the time limit expired. If I could give this Zero stars I would. I cannot download skped, I cannot download the movie programs I use, Basically you can not download most of the NORMAL programs you have to go to the chrome store and "purchase" things, and space to store things because there is no storage on this computer. The sound is nothing like they describe. Fine if you are a child and want to play games, I am not a child, I do not download game programs. There are no NORMAL book marks. I think the people who gave this things high rating are the people trying to sell this stupid thing. I spend a lot of money on trash. I called Samsung they told me I could not do what I need to do with this so called computer, I called amazon and contacted the seller at first they said they would allow me to return it now They tell me I can not. I looked at the reviews of this product before purchasing it. it got high marks, Why I wonder? all I can say is it must be the people who have a hand in trying to sell it, This is written on my old computer, that is how bad this product. total Trash!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Tootie
Reviews.Content: This laptop is not represented correctly. Not college student user friendly at all. It does not have an office/ word program unless u have wifi.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this laptop, especially since I'm leaving for college in about 2 weeks. It came in the next day and I was thrilled it was so light and compared to the macbook, but a lot cheaper.  The bootup time is incredibly fast but that's because you cannot install any programs, to keep it virus free.  With that being said, you can't download iTunes.  This is necessary for me, I just bought a new iPod touch.  While looking into I heard you could use a program called mspot, which is very similar to iTunes.  Turns out, I couldn't download this either because it "may be harmful to my computer".  I thought I would just give it a go and plug my ipod into the computer to see if it even recognized the device and it didn't.To add on to that, while explaining how it worked to my dad, I realized how the security of my files is completely unsecured.  If everything can be stored on a drive online, it can be accessible to whoever is able to hack into my login.The concept is a good idea, but ultimately it was such a disappointment.  Everytime I tried figuring out this laptop and how to do simple things, I would get frustrated and annoyed with anyone who tried to interrupt.  I found out I couldn't even do simple things that you expect from a laptop, like changing the background wallpaper.I honestly hated this laptop! Returning it and buying a completely different computer.

Reviews.Title: Pathetic attempt to improve Chromebook
Reviews.Author: A. Yeomans
Reviews.Content: For $500.00 you can get an i5 laptop, install Chrome Browser and you're good to go! Not only that you won't be restricted to certain websites because ChromeOS cannot support the leading edge web standards. The idea of a hassle free computer means a limited functionality type of computer. If you only do emails and simple documents then the Chromebook is right for you. The Jitterbug of computers has barely caught up; a dollar short and many days too late. I won't plunk down another $400 plus dollars for this extremely frustrating slow and web unfriendly device. Buyer Beware!!!
